text: “Ndipo uwomboli sudzathandiza kwa Iye (Allah) kupatula amene wamuloleza. Kufikira pamene mantha adzachotsedwa m’mitima mwawo (popatsidwa chilolezo choti apulumutse ena), adzanena pakati pawo (mosangalala): “Kodi wanena chiyani Mbuye wanu?” (Adzayankha): “Ndithu Iye wanena choona; Iye Ngotukuka Ngwamkulu.”
